title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 362: Featuring Brad Marsh
description:
On Episode 362 of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys are joined by Brad Marsh. The Flyers legend joined (1:05:07) to discuss his work with the Flyers Warriors team that helps disabled Military Veterans. The guys also dive into Bradâ€™s career with some funny stories along the way. The boys open the show discussing the big news out of Montreal along with the Tkachuk-Lemieux drama. The guys wrap up the show talking Olympic jerseys and some movie talk.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
